Hope and Code Labs

An open source program office for the progressive movement

About Us

Our mission is to provide a home for progressive tech projects.

In the run-up to an election, many campaigns develop useful code to help them execute their programs. Election Day comes and goes... and the code disappears. We're here to give that code a home, and to keep it in use for future cycles.

Contact us

If you'd like to help, fill out our contact form.
